text:
Hello,
Since Bug 42428, Workbench can be saved.
I think it is now time to save it by default.
Newbies are not aware of this element not being saved by default and think it's a bug.
I personally frequently forget to check Workbench and "swear" about the elements I lost.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
